name: Echoes of Night
description:
When a travelling merchant falls asleep dead drunk in Holberg he is not expecting to wake in a mysterious mansion, surrounded by endless masked servants awaiting the beginning of the Masquerade - though the other guests seem reluctant to explain what will happen...

Evade the sausage merchants! Insult your host! Definitely don't conduct rituals! And, last of all, try to leave alive and in the same shape you came in...

A text-based mystery with many endings to discover, inspired by Dramaturgical magic in the Empire LARP setting.
